text:
e="preserve">Meron Benvenisti (, April 21, 1934 – September 20, 2020) was an Israeli political scientist and politician. He was the Deputy Mayor of Jerusalem under Teddy Kollek from 1971 to 1978. He was in charge of East Jerusalem and was Jerusalem's Chief Planning Officer. He was a critic of Israel's policies towards Palestine.
Benvenisti died in Jerusalem on September 20, 2020 from renal failure at the age of 86.
